1""" 

2Mallett and Yuksel (2019) - Reflectance Recovery 

3================================================ 

4 

5Define the datasets for reflectance recovery using *Mallett and Yuksel 

6(2019)* method. 

7 

8References 

9---------- 

10- :cite:`Mallett2019` : Mallett, I., & Yuksel, C. (2019). Spectral Primary 

11 Decomposition for Rendering with sRGB Reflectance. Eurographics Symposium 

12 on Rendering - DL-Only and Industry Track, 7 pages. doi:10.2312/SR.20191216 

13"""
